settings.heading: Ingredients
settings.content: Zea Mays (Corn) Starch, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Sodium Lauroyl Glutamate, Water, Butylene Glycol, Sorbitol, Allantoin, Betaine, Citric Acid, Maltodextrin, Isopropyl Palmitate, Papain, Disodium EDTA, Avena Sativa (Oat) Meal Extract, Hydrolyzed Collagen, Opuntia Ficus-Indica Stem Extract, Pollen Extract, Houttuynia Cordata Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Asparagus Officinalis Stem Extract, Sodium MetabisulfiteNote: The above ingredients have been declared in descending order of their concentrations.

settings.heading: How to use
settings.content:
1. Apply a nickel-sized amount onto your clean palm.
  2. Add warm water and rub until a foam forms and all powder particles are dissolved. Gently massage the enriched foam on the entire surface of your face.
  3. Rinse thoroughly with warm water.

Click Here for Full Set of Steps

settings.text:
1. It’s mildly acidic which helps balance the skin.
  2. Its unique Papain enzyme removes impurities – resulting in moisturized, healthy, energized skin.
  3. When the fine powder meets water, it creates a rich foam that allows for thorough, yet gentle, non-irritating cleansing.

Inspired by eastern holistic practices in self-care, RIMAN aims to improve professional and personal lives across the world by inspiring people to embrace the sacred practice of slowing down and honoring oneself; to view self-care as much more than a chore or routine, but rather an ancient ritual with holistic benefits.
